extendedInfo.description: The Superman character was created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster and started life in DC comics in 1932.In 1938 Superman appeared in Action Comics and went on to appear in radio serials, tv, films etc and has been a firm favourite ever since.Please NoteOnce you have downloaded the App - you can view the video even if you have no network connection.Please consider the size of the App before purchase - on Android 2.2 (Froyo) and above you can load the app onto the SDCARD.
